Generate aggregate reporting tables for business insight.
Code a data validation testing suite for the pipeline.
Perform code reviews and drive bug triage.
Participate in sprint planning and design meetings.
skills: Strong SQL developer skills including experience in Postgres, Redshift, Snowflake or similar.
